name: Nox Dies (demo version)
description:
This is an interactive narrative I wrote a couple of years ago. The script has been more or less completed, so I will upload it here little by little once I have time to put that into the engine.

If you'd like the next part a bit sooner, buy me a ko-fi and leave "Nox Dies" as a message, or anything with the name of the game in the message. Your support is highly appreciated!

https://ko-fi.com/sixwingstories
